title: Black Book
synopsis: A beautiful Jewish woman averts Nazi capture, then assumes a new Aryan identity and joins the Dutch resistance movement.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the

title: Bullhead
synopsis: A Belgian cattle farmer who is tormented by his past becomes entangled in a bloody war between mobsters and police over his use of growth hormones.

title: New Kids Turbo
synopsis: The crisis is here. In the village of Maaskantje, the local youth have lost their jobs, and...their social security checks have stopped coming in.

title: New Kids Nitro
synopsis: In this sequel to New Kids Turbo, the crew is on probation, which means they've got to keep it together when a rival gang throws down the gauntlet.

title: Admiral
synopsis: In the 1600s, when the Netherlands is under attack by the British navy and on the verge of civil war, a Dutch admiral is his country's only hope.

title: Saint Nick
synopsis: Niklas, a sinister cleric, returns to avenge his death by killing innocent kids. Now a lad named Frank and a disgraced cop must stop the rampage.

title: Alles is Liefde
synopsis: Looking for love, falling in love, losing love, eluding love -- the stories of several couples at different stages in their relationships intertwine.

title: De Marathon
synopsis: Friends Gerard, Leo, Kees and Nico decide to find a sponsor and compete in the Rotterdam Marathon, hoping to pay off their employer's debt.

title: Bros Before Hos
synopsis: Partying stepbrothers whose parents' marriage was a disaster vow never to get into a relationship, but things change when both fall for the same girl.

title: Tabula Rasa
synopsis: When a young woman with amnesia becomes a key figure in a missing persons case, she must reconstruct her memories to clear her name.

title: The Heineken Kidnapping
synopsis: In 1983, wealthy brewer Alfred Heineken is kidnapped by hoodlums in Amsterdam and held for ransom. He later sets out to exact revenge on his captors.

title: Undercover Kitty
synopsis: This all-ages drama features a cat that takes the form of a young lady, then uses her feline charms to assist a reporter for the local newspaper.

title: The Resistance Banker
synopsis: Risking his family and future, a banker in occupied Amsterdam slows the Nazi war machine by creating an underground bank to fund the resistance.

title: Nova Zembla
synopsis: Nova Zembla is the legendary and true story of the adventurous exploration of Willem Barentsz.

title: Alles is Familie
synopsis: A new romantic comedy with a bite! In Family Way, the Roover family has come to a point where making crucial choices is inevitable.

title: Belgica
synopsis: Two brothers become partners in a modest nightclub and turn it into the hottest spot in town, but their exhilarating run of success comes at a price.

title: Renesse
synopsis: Tasked with scattering the ashes of his womanizing grandpa, a young man invites his hapless friends to join him at a notorious beach.

title: Daylight
synopsis: A lawyer learns she has a half-brother who's serving time in prison for a double murder, but after meeting him, she becomes convinced he's innocent.

title: De Surprise
synopsis: Sick of life, a wealthy man hires a company to kill him. But when he falls in love, he finds that getting out of his contract isn't going to be easy.

title: Achtste-groepers huilen niet
synopsis: When a fiercely competitive teenage soccer whiz is diagnosed with leukemia, her best friend comes up with a plan to raise her spirits.

title: Bride Flight
synopsis: While flying to New Zealand to tie the knot, three Dutch brides-to-be form a bond and meet a dashing cowboy who alters their lives.

title: Gooische Vrouwen
synopsis: As Cheryl's husband continues to ogle other women and Claire's daughter and grandson leave, the ladies decide they deserve a trip to Paris.

title: Verliefd op Ibiza
synopsis: On the island of Ibiza, where everyone wants to be young again, a group of people falls in love with each other and the island.

title: Costa!
synopsis: A lonely young woman finds friendship and romance on holiday at a beach resort nightclub when she joins dancers preparing for a TV competition.

title: Alleen Maar Nette Mensen
synopsis: David gets bored with his girlfriend, so he decides to learn what the Surinamese know -- including their taste in erotic music.

title: App
synopsis: When a new app downloads itself onto a woman's phone and begins taking control of her life, she goes to unthinkable lengths to get rid of it.

title: Hotel Beau Séjour
synopsis: Caught in an afterlife limbo, teenage Kato investigates her own mysterious death and unravels a web of secrets in her seemingly tranquil village.

title: Spijt
synopsis: When bullies harass an overweight boy, he gains allies and begins standing up for himself. The question is, will that be enough?
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: Sneeuwkoningin 2
synopsis: This sequel to Hans Christian Andersen's classic 'The Snow Queen' follows the exploits of Orm, a troll whose comical lies lead him into danger.

title: The Dinner
synopsis: This unconventional mystery centers on two sets of parents as they discuss their teenage sons' crimes -- which could ruin the lives of both couples.

title: Afblijven
synopsis: Als Melissa mag dansen in de videoclip van een bekende rapper doet ze iets doms. Om haar onzekerheid te verbergen slikt ze stiekem XTC. Het blijft niet bij één pilletje.

title: Jackie
synopsis: Twin sisters who were raised by their gay fathers finally get the chance to meet their birth mother when she calls them from out of the blue.

title: Patser
synopsis: Four ambitious but clueless stoners trigger a drug war when they steal a gangster’s cocaine shipment to earn some money and live the glamorous life.

title: Mannenharten
synopsis: In a search for love and happiness, six different men, from a slacker to a nerd, take stock of their lives and set course for their romantic futures.

title: De Eetclub
synopsis: A newcomer in a fancy neighborhood, wife and mother Karen makes some exciting new connections when she joins a group called the Dinner Club.

title: De Hel Van '63
synopsis: Conditions for the 1963 Elfstedentocht, a 200-kilometer ice skating race in the Netherlands, were so brutal that the few who finished became legends.

title: Toscaanse bruiloft
synopsis: The owners of a luxurious Tuscan villa welcome crowds of betrothed couples and their guests attending beautiful and sometimes bewildering weddings.

title: Lover of Loser
synopsis: When teen Eva falls for a stranger who then helps abduct her, it's up to her mild-mannered sweetheart, Mees, to find and rescue her.

title: Yes Nurse! No Nurse!
synopsis: In this campy musical based on the 1960s Dutch TV series, Nurse Klivia runs a rest home full of oddballs, who rouse the ire of a nasty neighbor.

title: Abeltje
synopsis: A young elevator operator presses the forbidden green button, sending him and his companions flying into a worldwide adventure.

title: A Noble Intention
synopsis: In 1888 Amsterdam, a headstrong violin maker finds himself immersed in peril and tragedy after challenging businessmen who threaten his community.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: Bloed, Zweet en Tranen
synopsis: The life of popular Dutch singer André Hazes unfolds in this biopic chronicling his youth, his rise to stardom and his struggles with alcoholism.

title: Razend
synopsis: Sven, a teenage boy who is abused by his father, decides to make a movie with his crush Roosmarijn, who's juggling problems of her own.

title: Radeloos
synopsis: When Paco loses his dad, he thinks it's his fault. He stops working and his girlfriend dumps him.

title: Timboektoe
synopsis: When their family moves to France to open a campsite, teenage siblings Kars and Isa make new friends quickly, but trouble soon finds them.

title: De Verbouwing
synopsis: Tessa lives an ideal life -- until she accepts help from a supposed friend who brings nothing but torment and blackmail.

title: In Oranje
synopsis: Remco is a soccer talent but when his dad dies, his world caves in. His friend takes him to his grandma who can summon up winti spirits.

title: Solan and Ludwig en de sneeuwmachine
synopsis: When a snow-making machine falls into the wrong hands, it's up to two buddies -- a magpie and a hedgehog -- to save their village.

title: De Schippers Van De Kameleon
synopsis: Hielke and Sietse are the infamous twins from the Frisian village of Lenten. They have one big wish: own a boat, and their dream comes true!

title: Kappen!
synopsis: When his two best friends begin hanging out with a new student, Sander tries to do likewise -- until a shocking act of violence changes everything.

title: Liever Verliefd
synopsis: Playing the field with two different boyfriends, Anna gets a jolt when she realizes the men are roommates -- and that she might be falling in love.

title: A Thousand Kisses
synopsis: Giph, a writer grieving a loss, and girlfriend Samarinde, a model and medical student, take stock of their past and future while vacationing in Spain.

title: Clean Hands
synopsis: A drug dealer's wife finally realizes she can no longer turn a blind eye to his violent profession when it begins to endanger their children.

title: Prins
synopsis: In order to win the girl of his dreams, troubled teenager Ayoub must become the right-hand man of the crook who rules an Amsterdam housing project.

title: Eigen Kweek
synopsis: When a family of potato farmers falls on hard times, they determine that growing marijuana is their ticket to improving their fortunes.

title: Prey
synopsis: Police are unable to explain the brutal murder of a farmer's family. But a local veterinarian is convinced she knows who -- or what -- is behind it.

title: Ellis in Glamourland
synopsis: When a relationship guru offers her lessons in how to marry a millionaire, single mom Ellis enters a high-society dream world, but will she find love?

title: Thor: Legend of the Magical Hammer
synopsis: Thor, an overconfident teen with a magical weapon, and a handful of imperfect gods join forces against an evil queen and her army of giants.

title: Tonio
synopsis: After a car hits and kills their son, Tonio, grieving parents Adri and Mirjam struggle to move on while piecing together moments from his brief life.

title: Smoorverliefd
synopsis: Four women in the same family lean on each other as they fumble their way through the crazy uncertainties of love, sex and romance.

title: Bloedlink
synopsis: Two ex-convicts kidnap the daughter of a wealthy tycoon and hold her for ransom, but their victim soon begins to hatch a plan of her own.

title: Code 37
synopsis: Driven to solve heinous crimes by her own haunting past, an unconventional cop begins work as the new head of a sex crimes unit.

title: Homies
synopsis: Timo is trying to win back the girlfriend who dumped him, but a misadventure with his roommates, 22 kilos of cocaine and the Russian mob isn't helping.

title: Pak Van Mijn Hart
synopsis: While managing their father's costume company, two brothers find their lives upended by a businesswoman with a plan to challenge holiday traditions.

title: Allez, Eddy!
synopsis: A kid with health problems secretly enters a bicycle race sponsored by a new supermarket, even though his father, the local butcher, has forbidden it.

title: De poel
synopsis: While camping by a secluded pond in the woods, two families start getting driven apart by eerie dreams, strange occurrences and an unknown presence.

title: Leef!
synopsis: When Anna takes up writing as a way to deal with her feelings for her stifling mother, the consequences of her words go far beyond what she imagined.

title: Isabelle
synopsis: A painter obsessed with beauty kidnaps a gorgeous movie star and locks her in a basement, where she faces starvation as part of a grim art project.

title: Brasserie Valentine
synopsis: It's February 14. As couples enjoy romantic dinners at her restaurant, Valentijn encounters an old flame who wants her to run away with him.

title: De Boskampi's
synopsis: A perpetually harassed kid turns the tables on bullying classmates and new neighbors by convincing them his meek accountant dad is really a Mafia don.

title: Sneekweek
synopsis: Six friends spend the holidays in a seaside villa, but a secret from the past soon rises to the surface and turns their vacation into a nightmare.

title: Mees Kees
synopsis: Mr. Kees is a substitute teacher who's young, eccentric and full of fun. Of course the kids love him -- but their uptight principal isn't so pleased.

title: Dik Trom
synopsis: Dik Trom is a happy and chubby guy but his happiness is compromised when he moves to Dunhoven where his mom and dad start a restaurant.

title: Bon Bini Holland
synopsis: On the island of Curaçao, an amiable scam artist angers gangsters and flees to Holland, where his conscience is torn between a woman and a new scheme.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: Kameleon 2
synopsis: Twin brothers Hielke and Sietse face off against a greedy contractor who wants to build a highway right through their quaint village.

title: Mannenharten 2
synopsis: Although the lives of the 'Mannenharten' men have changed, they continue their quest for love and try to navigate the tricky waters of romance.

title: De Ontsnapping
synopsis: Still grieving the long-ago loss of her brother, a restless wife and mother goes on an escapade to Portugal, where she soon learns to face her past.

title: Popoz
synopsis: Two wild-card detectives who have insatiable appetites for action and trouble keep it up even after going to prison for an accidental shooting.

title: Soof 2
synopsis: After her marriage comes undone, Soof needs to reinvent herself and get her life back on track. Is the handsome young Bauke the answer?

title: Weg van Jou
synopsis: Evi is raring for a new job in an exotic land. When she's forced to relocate to a rural seaside hamlet instead, she has to rethink life and love.

title: Pluk Van De Petteflet
synopsis: When he finds out the nearby park his animal friends live in might be destroyed, a little boy with a red tow truck comes to their rescue.

title: The Resurrection of a Bastard
synopsis: A brutal gangster emerges from a near-death experience a changed man, but the transformation doesn't mean he's ready to let his attacker off the hook.

title: Voor Elkaar Gemaakt
synopsis: After an ill-conceived tryst leaves him infertile, a freewheeling bachelor gets in touch with the recipient of a previous sperm donation.

title: 100% Coco
synopsis: On the first day of school, exuberant fashionista Coco finds it's tough to stand out. Will a mask and a vlog give her the courage to be herself?

title: Bevergem
synopsis: Rock 'n' roll roughneck Freddy De Vadder is on the run, so he's lying low in a quaint West Flanders backwater. Local tensions, however, are growing.

title: Pijnstillers
synopsis: While he aims for a spot in a youth orchestra, pianist Casper sets out to reconnect with his estranged father after his mother falls seriously ill.

title: Lilly the Witch: The Dragon and the Magic Book
synopsis: One day, 10-year-old Lilly gets an unexpected visit from a dragon, who brings her a magic book that will teach her how to fight an evil magician.

title: Fissa
synopsis: In this nod to Project X, teens Max and Yous need nerdy Ruben to help them pass final exams. In return, they'll help throw the most epic party EVER.

title: Adios Amigo
synopsis: Three sexually inexperienced friends with disabilities take an anything-goes road trip to Spain in hopes of losing their virginities.

title: Dolfje weerwolfje
synopsis: On his seventh birthday, Dolfje changes into a white, soft wolf. Dolfje wants to keep this secret at all cost, but can he?

title: Mees Kees op kamp
synopsis: When no-nonsense director Dreus strains her back on the first day of school camp, lovable goof Mister Twister is put in charge of rowdy Class 6b.

title: In Real Life
synopsis: Cinema collides with real life when a director casts his girlfriend in a romantic movie opposite a member of the crew who has no acting experience.

title: De Reunie
synopsis: For Sabine, an invitation to her high school reunion stirs up dark and difficult memories of a childhood friend who disappeared years ago.

title: Bollywood Hero
synopsis: While in Mumbai for a Bollywood film role, a Dutch actor unwittingly causes an accident that compels him to fix the plight of those around him.

title: Brammetje Baas
synopsis: An imaginative, distractible kid struggles under his strict teacher. The boy's parents want him to adapt without extinguishing the spark inside of him.

title: Those Were the Days
synopsis: Jaap's life goes into a tailspin after the Dutch national football team's 1974 World Cup loss. He must rely on his new friends to find a way back.

title: Tuintje in mijn Hart
synopsis: A man who has been living in the Netherlands for 20 years is called back to his native Suriname, where he navigates a complicated family dynamic.

title: Leve Boerenliefde
synopsis: When a handsome widowed farmer is forced to participate in a romantic television competition, he finds himself attracted to the show's celebrity host.

title: Northern Light
synopsis: Following a devastating tragedy, a troubled coach for an after-school boxing program struggles to engage with his sensitive teenage son.

title: Vuurzee
synopsis: A community is thrown into turmoil when a Turkish immigrant's daughter goes missing and his best friend's son becomes a suspect.

title: Wat Mannen Willen
synopsis: Six men with very different takes on relationships search for love with results that range from triumphant to disastrous.

title: De Held
synopsis: A series of sudden, seemingly random acts of violence drive a woman to launch an investigation into her family's past.

title: De Ridder
synopsis: In the court of Ghent, one case’s tragic outcome prompts ambitious young attorney Helena De Ridder to make a new start as a public prosecutor.

title: Bellicher
synopsis: A hotshot consultant is framed for murder and fights to prove his innocence. But the more he digs, the more he realizes how deep the conspiracy goes.

title: Tiramisu
synopsis: When lavish spending finally catches up with her, a stage actress asks a humorless accountant to help bring her back from the brink of bankruptcy.

title: Dansen Op De Vulkaan
synopsis: Longing to be a normal teen, talented dancer Maarten keeps his chronic illness a secret. But his risky behavior pushes his body to the breaking point.

title: Hanni and Nanni
synopsis: After they're accused of shoplifting, 12-year-old twins Hanni and Nanni are sent away to boarding school, where they have lots of adventures.

title: Theo Maassen: Zonder Pardon
synopsis: Award-winning comedian Theo Maassen takes the stage in Rotterdam, Netherlands, and lets loose with a performance full of pitch-black observations.

title: Onder het Hart
synopsis: When a recently separated father receives a grave diagnosis, his new girlfriend begins spending time with his ex-wife and children.

title: Snuf de Hond in Oorlogstijd
synopsis: Friesland, 1945. After his parents are killed in a bombing, Tom goes to live with his aunt and uncle on a farm and seeks revenge against the Nazis.

title: Hans Teeuwen - Spiksplinter
synopsis: Filmed live on his 2011 tour, absurdist comedian Hans Teeuwen returns with all-new material, from skits and improvisation to music and magic tricks.

title: Fashion Chicks
synopsis: An introvert creates an online alter ego to launch a successful fashion blog, but things get tricky when her two disparate lives start to collide.

title: Meester Kikker
synopsis: When they learn their teacher can't help but turn into a frog, a group of children sets out to protect him against a predator and help him keep his job.

title: Mees Kees op de planken
synopsis: A teacher and his pupils perform a play they've been rehearsing at a retirement home, but decide their headmistress's dull script needs spicing up.

title: De Masters
synopsis: Stuck in a deepening rut and still dreaming his rap career might take off, a divorced dad desperately reassembles his old hip-hop crew.

title: Holland: Natuur in de Delta
synopsis: Enjoy an homage to the stunning scenery, majestic wildlife and ageless forces of nature found throughout Holland's lush and vivid landscapes.

title: Alles Stroomt
synopsis: A widowed mother's close relationship with her son is thrown into turmoil when he moves out of their home, and she moves in with another man.

title: Dummie de Mummie
synopsis: Goos discovers a living mummy in his room, and soon they're best friends. But when he loses the magic scarab that gives him life, Goos must find it.

title: Theo Maassen - Met Alle Respect
synopsis: Biting satirist Theo Maassen delivers a knockout performance drawing parallels between the foibles of Dutch society and his own midlife crisis.

title: Hallo Bungalow
synopsis: Three frustrated holiday park employees cook up a scheme to blackmail their crooked new boss, who quickly turns the tables on them.

title: Theo Maassen: VANKWAADTOTERGER
synopsis: In a time of war, conflict and culture clashes, performer Theo Maassen's theatrical style of comedy is fueled by outrage and cynical observation.

title: Spangas In Actie
synopsis: When their college is set to close, students occupy the building and refuse to leave -- but internal conflicts soon threaten their protest.

title: Team Chocolate
synopsis: A young man with Down syndrome who works at a chocolate factory falls in love with a colleague, but her immigration status could pose a problem.

title: Bella Donna's
synopsis: To honor the memory of their adventurous friend, three women set out to complete her bucket list -- including finding true love.

title: The Odd One Out
synopsis: Born into a long line of surly, masculine butchers, sensitive young Jere is caught between his bullish father and his warm and caring grandmother.

title: Heksen bestaan niet
synopsis: When one of the five Star Witches rejects their collective duty to protect the world from evil, the others must recruit her replacement.

title: Jack bestelt een broertje
synopsis: All Jack wants for his birthday is a baby brother. But when his two mommies buy him a rabbit instead, he takes to the Internet to get what he wants.

title: Daniël Arends: De Zachte Heelmeester
synopsis: In a performance that's equal parts stand-up comedy and cathartic monologue, award-winning entertainer Daniël Arends examines how we deal with pain.

title: Dummie de Mummie 2
synopsis: Discovering that a mysterious figurine called the Sphinx of Shakaba can help Dummie, he and Goos set out to retrieve it -- from the bottom of the sea.

title: Najib Amhali: Alles Komt Goed
synopsis: With much speed, jokes, and self-mockery, comedian Najib Amhali tells about his life in 'Alles komt goed'.

title: Snuf de Hond en het Spookslot
synopsis: When Tom and Miriam vacation at the home of relatives, they and their dog, Sniff, become entangled with criminals and a local ghost story.

title: Apenstreken
synopsis: A 9-year-old orphan forced to work in a factory hopes of going to school like other kids. After running away he has the adventures of his dreams.

title: De Sneeuwkoningin
synopsis: When the Snow Queen learns a pair of siblings have the power to thwart her plan to create a world of eternal winter, she she sets out to find them.

title: Snuf de Hond en de Jacht op Vliegende Volckert
synopsis: Mirjam and Tom investigate: when they come near the swamp, they meet Forester Grevendonk who tells them they have been baited by a ghost.

title: Misfit
synopsis: After living in America for years, a teenage girl moves back to the Netherlands and is quickly singled out as a misfit by the popular clique at school.

title: Woozle and Pip in Search of the Scallywagger!
synopsis: With the help of their animal friends, puppies Woozle and Pip go on a search for the mysterious thief who stole Wise Fern's birthday present.

title: MeesterSpion
synopsis: While eluding bullies in his new town, 10-year-old Tim awakens a cryogenically frozen spy from the 1970s and helps him resolve unfinished business.

title: Helden Van De Zee
synopsis: While on holiday, the heroes of popular kids show 'Helden' decide to cross the sea on self-made boats to reunite Dempsey with his dream girl.

title: Dummie de Mummie en de tombe van Achnetoet
synopsis: A homesick mummy yearns to visit his parents' grave and say goodbye. With help from his friends, he sets off to Egypt to find their ancient tomb.

title: Snuf de Hond en de IJsvogel
synopsis: Sniff the dog and his family embark on a sailing vacation, but a case of mistaken identity lands them in jail for burglary.

title: Crimi Clowns 2.0: Uitschot
synopsis: Clowning by day and committing crime by night, the Tersago family must keep its act together despite a run-in with the police -- and a Russian kingpin.

title: Buitenkampers
synopsis: Interviews and archival footage detail the adversity endured by Indo-Dutch children and their families during and after World War II.

title: Bert Visscher: Zelden Zoiets Gezien
synopsis: Comedian Bert Visscher storms the stage with more of his trademark manic humor, this time taking aim at the trials and tribulations of air travel.

title: Daniël Arends: Carte Blanche
synopsis: Always confrontational and provocative, comic performer Daniël Arends challenges orthodoxy, the fakery and hypocrisy of modern life, and even himself.

title: Youp van 't Hek: Licht
synopsis: Dutch comedian and cabaret performer Youp van 't Hek celebrates life's light moments in his first new show since being sidelined by health problems.

title: Niko
synopsis: Reindeer Niko is looking for his dad who is in the Flying Brigade, but first he needs flying lessons from Julius, the flying squirrel.

title: Sien van Sellingen
synopsis: This award-winning children's tale follows the adventures of Sien, a tough, down-to-earth little girl who lives on a traditional farm.

title: Joy
synopsis: In this gripping psychological drama, Joy cannot overcome the trauma of having been abandoned as an infant and being raised in an orphanage. Now a teenager, Joy obsesses over her mother's identity, despite her boyfriend's attempts to help her.

title: Pieter Derks: Zo Goed Als Nieuw
synopsis: Pieter Derks offers his comic take on current events, putting elections, the Islamic State, global warming and low-cost air travel in his sights.

title: Guido Weijers: V
synopsis: For confrontational, intelligent humor, look no further than award-winner and 'sexy vegetarian' Guido Weijers, who offers up his fifth comedy special.

title: De Griezelbus
synopsis: After a humiliating encounter with the school bully, shy Onnoval writes a gruesome story of revenge that starts coming true.

title: Van Der Laan and Woe: Alles Eromheen
synopsis: Dutch musical cabaret duo Niels van der Laan and Jeroen Woe offer up a comedy special chock-full of absurdity and hilarity.

title: Sara Kroos: Van Jewelste
synopsis: Comedic performer Sara Kroos illuminates the beauty and pain of daily life, where family and romantic relationships are an endless source of laughs.

title: Najib Amhali: The Best Of
synopsis: All his shows have been sold out, night after night. The best of his shows has been compiled in one live show, 'The Best of Najib Amhali'.

title: Devastated by Love
synopsis: A creatively blocked writer meets his muse in a red-headed cable-car driver. But when her route is closed, he becomes obsessed with finding her.

title: Acda and de Munnik, afscheid in Carré
synopsis: Musicians Thomas Acda and Paul de Munnik deliver a powerful performance at the Carré Theatre in Amsterdam.

title: Leon van der Zanden - Supergewoon
synopsis: One of Netherlands' most well-known performers of cabaret, Leon van der Zanden lights up the stage for a night of interactive and heartfelt comedy.

title: Safety First
synopsis: Safety First gets a call to provide security at a dance festival. These klutzes may be ready for the big time, but is the big time ready for them?

title: Ronald Goedemondt: Ze bestaan echt
synopsis: 'Ze bestaan echt' deals with growing up and facing your fears. Ronald openly discusses all the things one has to watch out for.

title: Ronald Goedemondt: Binnen De Lijntjes
synopsis: His previous show, 'Dedication', won the 2008 Neerlands Hope Prize. Ronald Goedemondt's new show, 'Binnen de lijntjes', deals with conformity.

title: Riphagen - The Untouchable
synopsis: This biopic profiles Andries Riphagen, a Dutch criminal who blackmailed Jews in hiding during World War II and was responsible for hundreds of deaths.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the

title: Ronald Goedemondt: De R van Ronald
synopsis: With nonstop energy, comedian Ronald Goedemondt shares his zaniest thoughts on everything from fear and anxiety to ninja dogs and speedboat rides.

title: Ronald Goedemondt: Dedication
synopsis: In his third program standup comedy special, Goedemont weaves a tapestry of hilarity for his Amsterdam audience.

title: Freek De Jonge: Als Je Me Nu Nog Niet Kent
synopsis: He may be 70, but comedian, writer, singer, actor and cultural observer Freek de Jonge has more to say than ever in this evening of stories and songs.

title: Blackie wil naar de maan
synopsis: A sheepdog must prove his worthiness when one of his flock sets out to travel to the moon and the rest are taken in by a wolf promising them stardom.

title: Die schonsten Marchen der Bruder Grimm
synopsis: This production of Grimm's famous German fairy tales comes from the country where they originated.

title: La Famiglia
synopsis: A family of Italian émigrés living in the Netherlands walks the line between a legitimate restaurant business and more nefarious activities.

title: Johan
synopsis: This biographical drama series follows the ups and downs on the field and in the personal life of legendary Dutch footballer Johan Cruijff.

title: Jandino: Whatever it Takes
synopsis: Jandino Asporaat riffs on the challenges of raising kids and serenades the audience with a rousing rendition of 'Sex on Fire' in his comedy show.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: Daniel Arends: Blessuretijd
synopsis: In his third show, Daniël Arends argues that good deeds are a form of self interest, and evil deeds are a hobby.
